The ambush is the latest in a wave of attacks in Kenya that authorities have blamed on militants connected to the Shabaab .
On Friday a double bomb attack in a Nairobi market left 10 people dead and scores wounded .
Kenya has been targeted by the Shabaab since sending troops to war - torn Somalia in 2011 .
